item.title: Question about Deltascape
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

baez9:

Umm, search wha the viewing orbs say and when u find it change it…

Dosnt work if you look at the code i put up thats what i see

so about “character file not found” i see this.

[code] long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
String line = “”;
String token = “”;
String token2 = “”;
String[] token3 = new String[3];
boolean EndOfFile = false;
int ReadMode = 0;
BufferedReader characterfile = null;
boolean charFileFound = false;
int[] playerLooks = new int[19];

	try {
		characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./characters/"
				+ playerName + ".txt"));
		charFileFound = true;
	} catch (FileNotFoundException fileex1) {
	}
	if (charFileFound == false) {
		misc.println(playerName + ": character file not found.");
		return 0;
	}[/code]

Still working out the death respawn and what the veiwing orbs say look at my other post is what i see in text handeler.java

item.title: Question about Deltascape
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

I assure you everything i said is accurate lol. I have used delta source for a long time. Search for your starter and there should be some coords above it where you ahve your login text. Then search for you death method for another. In player.java search for “character file not found” i think it is
and you will see the coords for login. Then search the name of the tele you want changed in clickingmost.java as most have the names by them. Keep searching down. Dont control+f it once time. You keep searching down for all of them. They are there trust me.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about Deltascape
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

Death is not in player.java
Also in texthandeler.java i found monster tele but how do u change like what the veiwing orbs say? hey are not in there it look like this

c.sendQuest("Monster tele", 1415); c.sendQuest("Battle different monsters", 1416); c.sendQuest("Monster tele", 13071); c.sendQuest("Battle different monsters", 13072); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13076); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13077); c.sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13078);
Got this from a different post

New Home when u loging (plz help)

the home coords are in many places. For spawning when you first start playing its in player.java, for jailing and death purposes its in client.jav and for tele its in clickingmost.java

But it did not work :S
